Title: Prohibits the inclusion of confidential clauses in contracts entered into for the purchase of services or commodities by the state
Summary: Prohibits the inclusion of confidential clauses in contracts entered into for the purchase of services or commodities by the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง163, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting the inclusion of confidential clauses in contracts entered into for the purchase of services or commodities by the state
